jd: From: Komal Gupta, Largeton Inc komal@largeton.us Reply to: komal@largeton.us Oracle Financial Data Warehouse AdministratorDur: 10 monthLoc: remotely from anywhere in Texas.Visa: No H1B/CPT/OPTLinkedIn neededClient: State of TXOnly submit candidates with:- Jira experience- Oracle Certification- Experience with Financial data warehouse applications and/or database reporting features We are seeking an Oracle Database Administrator with strong knowledge of Oracle programming, systems design, database structures, and current database technologies for a Financial Data Warehouse for a 10 month contract position working remotely from anywhere in Texas.Responsibilities include:1. Manage and monitor database performance2. Direct programmers and analysts to make system changes3. Review and correct programs4. Perform database tuning for improved performance5. Assist in planning and developing integrated database systems6. Evaluate and incorporate user requests for new data elements7. Ensure data integrity and controls redundancy8. Conduct data modeling and prototyping9. Implement security and recovery procedures10. Optimize database search strategies and storage11. Maintain data dictionary and sets standards12. Create test environments and manages database backups13. Assist with disaster recovery procedures14. Help select and install database software15. Ensure compliance with accessibility standards16. Provide user support for data retrieval and accessibility issuesRequirements:Yrs Experience6 Experience in Oracle database design, analysis, and performance tuning for a Financial Data Warehouse.6 Experience in Oracle database structures and data analysis6 Experience designing enterprise applications and/or services6 Experience creating technical and functional design documentation6 Experience within software development lifecycle using Agile methodology – (Scrum, for example)6 Experience with multi-tier system/application development – (SOA, Microservices, 3-Tier applications, for example)1 Jira experience1 Oracle Certification1 Experience with Financial data warehouse applications and/or database reporting features Regards,Komal Gupta | Sr. Technical RecruiterLargeton INC.Herndon, VA 20171Komal@largeton.us
